products.title: Splash Sonar
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
